com.idibon.api.model

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idibon.api.model.Annotation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Annotation.Assignment, Annotation.Judgment

    public abstract class Annotation
extends Object
    An Annotation represents an annotation on a Document. An annotation may be either an Assignment, or a Judgment. - An Assignment defines that a Document, or region of text within a Document (i.e., a Span) is or is not an example of a specific Label. - A Judgment is an independent evaluation of the correctness of an Assignment.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Annotation.Assignment
      An Assignment annotation.
      static class  Annotation.DocumentAssignment
      Simple marker subclass for Assignments that classify an entire Document.
      static class  Annotation.Judgment
      A Judgment annotation.
      static class  Annotation.Keys
      Keys in the annotation JSON hash.
      static class  Annotation.Provenance
      The annotation provenance describes how the annotation was created; either as a process of direct human interaction, indirectly from multiple human annotations, or automatically by a predictive agent.
      static class  Annotation.SpanAssignment
      Classfies a region of text (a span) within a Document.

    • Field Detail

      • uuid

        public final UUID uuid
        Annotation UUID (may be null if the annotation has not been uploaded to the API)

      • active

        public final boolean active
        True if the annotation is active. Inactive annotations are ignored for machine learning purposes, and serve only as a record of an earlier annotation.

      • createdAt

        public final Date createdAt
        Date annotation was created

      • updatedAt

        public final Date updatedAt
        Date annotation was most recently modified

      • userID

        public final UUID userID
        User ID (may be null) of the user who created the annotation.
